document_data.name: Appointments with the Mighty
document_data.source: [[City of Delights| City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Appointments with the Mighty''' was a shop located in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: Appointments with the Mighty could be found in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of the City of Delights.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Rayad al-Farif]] owned and operated this establishment.
document_data.Activities:
Rayad claimed to be able to make appointments for his customers with the heads of the various mosques or even the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]]. He only charged his customers if he succeeded in making the appointment.

For appointments with the Grand Caliph, Rayad merely signed his customer up to attend a public audience.
